"dweb:/ipfs/QmeCfPykghhMc81VJTrHTC7sF6CRvaA1FXVq2pJhwYp1dV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x982c5cb790ab941d1e04f807120a71709d4c313ba0bfc16006447ffbd27fbbd5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8150ceb4ac947e8a442b2a9c017e01e880b2be2dd958f1fa9bc405f4c5a86508","dweb:/ipfs/QmbcBmFX66AY6Kbhnd5gx7zpkgqnUafo43XnmayAM7zVdB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Pausable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdb484371dfbb848cb6f5d70464e9ac9b2900e4164ead76bbce4fef0b44bcc68f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f9d6f6f6600a2bec622f699081b58350873b5e63ce05464d17d674a290bb8a7c","dweb:/ipfs/QmQKVzSQY1PM3Bid4QhgVVZyx6B4Jx7XgaQzLKHj38vJz8"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/MicroLoan.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9d2c1b896d514963ad4e015ba6eef878ba758b28f77a0db53e7a981eb754fd9d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://30bae58e17f4e91904b724b21f441797ddd52ea84e2d5485dc811b88de9c624b","dweb:/ipfs/QmNtbjfmPt3HAanifxShPvUV66cqEzJQTT7dfDwp72a1Yb"]},"src/MicroLoanFactory.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb7a744757319add1750f3edf01a5c18c3cd4d658f970242b902e0c3affb55144","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3f60f273606a633e1ef220d084f5bf457c012b517e8ef5b81a8fe19a83deb979","dweb:/ipfs/QmWXUgZLBNYgbtY1aLSeHubAhEKbP1Fa98MRvhx3krAc6g"]}},"version":1}

createLoan(address,string,uint256,uint25.details: Validates all parameters against factory bounds. Prevents multiple active loans per borrower.

params.borrower: Address that will receive the disbursed funds and is responsible for repayment
params.firstDueDate: Unix timestamp when first payment is due
params.fundraisingDeadline: Unix timestamp when fundraising expires if not fully funded
params.metadataURI: IPFS or HTTP URI pointing to loan metadata (title, description, image, etc.)
params.periodLength: Duration of each period in seconds (e.g., 30 days)
params.principal: Total amount to raise and repay (in funding token base units, e.g., USDC has 6 decimals)

returns.loanAddr: Address of the newly created MicroLoan contract

notifyLoanClosed().details: Unlocks the borrower to create a new loan. Only callable by loan contracts created by this factory.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only affects createLoan(); existing loans continue to operate normally

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

notifyLoanClosed().notice: Called by MicroLoan contracts when they complete or are cancelled

pause().notice: Pause new loan creation in case of emergency

setBounds(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Update term and period length bounds for new loans

unpause().notice: Unpause loan creation after emergency is resolved
